headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 8 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 8 airports right now. No engine anti-ice operations are currently flagged. Across base airports: 4 critical, 22 high, 5 medium, 8 normal. Key bases needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Sibiu (SBZ/LRSB); plus 23 other bases. 5 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, mist and low cloud base  — most notably around Sibiu (SBZ/LRSB), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) and Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK). Network hotspots: Banja Luka (BNX/LQBK), Sibiu (SBZ/LRSB), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) and 3 others. Primary drivers: low cloud base, approach minima limits and cold‑temperature performance penalties. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Billund (BLL/EKBI), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB) and 9 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 8 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 200 m, cloud base around 0 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: mist; visibility down to 1.2 km, cloud base around 200 ft | Sibiu (SBZ/LRSB) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 150 m, RVR down to 400 m, cloud base around 300 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — HIGH: fog; cold-temperature performance penalties; visibility down to 700 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 150 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times and 20 others. Worst affected now: Banja Luka (BNX/LQBK) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 150 m, RVR down to 450 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), low-visibility takeoff restrictions, runway visual range (RVR) constraints) | Sibiu (SBZ/LRSB) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 150 m, RVR down to 400 m, cloud base around 300 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), low-visibility takeoff restrictions, runway visual range (RVR) constraints) | Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; strong gusts risk (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, snow/blowing snow) | Billund (BLL/EKBI) — CRIT: snow; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings) | Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) — CRIT: freezing fog; cold-temperature performance penalties; visibility down to 500 m, cloud base around 100 ft (drivers: low-visibility takeoff restrictions, runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties) and 2 others. Changed since last run: Billund (BLL/EKBI), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Birmingham (BHX/EGBB), Leeds Bradford (LBA/EGNM), Treviso Antonio Canova (TSF/LIPH), Venice Marco Polo (VCE/LIPZ), Lamezia Terme Sant'Eufemia (SUF/LICA), Rome–Fiumicino Leonardo da Vinci (FCO/LIRF), Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN) and 2 others.
